message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its immense value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $850,000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I believe the product's value warrants a higher price. I'm willing to come down to $920,000. This offer reflects the true worth of what I'm offering.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $880,000. I think this is a reasonable compromise considering the product's value to me.
